name: LyokoVR
description:
Put yourself in virtual world of robot monsters with world exploration and combat actions, strategy move.
Playing as First-person shooter and do things like generate an energy field, shooting arrows, sword impact, throw fan. You must calculate enemy distances, health point and their pattern to move, dodge and perform a strike attack.

- Playing as 4 characters
- More than 4 sectors
- Various X.A.N.A monsters
